item.title: Offered a cash price for a prenatal genetic test? It may be your best bet
item.description: An expectant mom got a $750 bill for a blood test to check for genetic abnormalities in her baby. Then she tried to figure out why it was so high.

item.title: The Price Increases That Should Cause Americans More Alarm
item.description: The cost of health insurance is rising faster than the price of eggs or gasoline.
